page.title: 15SUNDAY IN BENWELL
page.content: It is{Sunday}and I get up at half past seven. I wash my face and brush my teeth. I have some{Rice Krispies}for my breakfast. At about half past ten I go to St. Joseph's church for mass. Today some of the children are making their first{Holy Communion}and I am singing in the choir. After mass I go home and draw some pictures and read a book. I often have fish and chicken and rice for dinner on a Sunday. After dinner I do my book summary for my reading book and I have to look after my baby sister. I have rice, egg, and fish for supper and then my mam and dad went out to work. I get washed and watch the{television} for a while. Now it is bed time, it is half past eight and I am going to bed. Sunday is over for another week.
